body:
Hey, everyone. So, as you may or may not have noticed, I'm hardly on the network anymore, and sadly (or happily to some of you), I don't think that's going to change soon. However, for all you smartphone users out there, I've recently gotten 2 apps that are both really fun, and they're free, too. 

The first one is called Quiz-Up. For those who have played Trivia Crack before (and I regret ever playing it), it's like that, only a LOT more well-made and a LOT more professional. My Quiz-Up account name is "Cynder Block."
Here's a little overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GmkPhSwkfuI

The other is called Evil Apples. Essentially, it's an online version of Cards Against Humanity, but to me, Evil Apples is even more offensive and therefore funnier. My Evil Apples account name is "Cynnamon" (I mean, no sh*t).
Here's a recent video of someone playing it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GuJ_dHcm1Y8

Moderators, if this is completely useless and irrelevant, feel free to lock it, but only if you feel the absolute need to ;)

Thanks for reading.

title: Just a few apps to look into
